about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Fullstack Web Developer specialized in JavaScript/TypeScript (React, Node.js, MongoDB), I have built complete projects ranging from efficient backends to modern and interactive user-oriented interfaces.
Passionate about Web3, I have developed decentralized applications (dApps), integrated WalletConnect, implemented staking systems, and worked on Chrome extensions similar to MetaMask.
My unique career path, with over 10 years of experience in management and business operations, has given me strong skills to manage complex projects, lead teams, and maintain a high level of quality.
Rigorous, autonomous, and product-oriented, I design modern, secure, and scalable solutions while keeping a strong focus on user experience.
